alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Knox (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 9:11PM CST until February 26 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lincoln IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois... Spoon River at London Mills affecting Knox and Fulton Counties. .An ice jam will cause water to infiltrate the lowlands along the river. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spoon River at London Mills. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor flooding begins to agricultural land near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 14.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 16.0 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Spoon River London Mill 15.0 14.4 Tue 8 pm CST 16.0 15.5 15.0 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
